EnterPhoneNumber.consent: I confirm my understanding of the personal data processing terms in Bratislava. I'm aware that the parking policy conditions may change under Regulation No. 6/2023 and the Operating Regulations.

EnterVerificationCode.instructions: Continue by entering 6-digit code from message we’ve sent.

AddParkingCards.instructions: If you are registered in PAAS, enter the e-mail address you entered when creating your account. Thanks to it, we will be able to upload all your parking cards.
AddParkingCards.verifyYourEmailInfo:
We’ve sent verification e-mail to {{email}}. 

Click on Verify button in the e-mail to approve verification and we will then add parking card directly to the app.
